MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:50pm to make a repair to faulty electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:01pm on 1st March 2021.
